cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with information retrieval and coding theory, which are closely related to the sub-fields of information theory (cs.IT), cryptography (cs.CR), data structures (cs.DS), databases (cs.DB), and computational complexity (cs.CC). The use of MDS array codes is a key component of the proposed scheme, which is a well-known coding technique in information theory and coding theory. Therefore, cs.IT and cs.CR are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves the design of a scheme for accessing a replicated database, which is a problem in data structures and databases. Finally, the paper discusses the field size and sub-packetization of the proposed scheme, which are related to computational complexity.
